itemDescription: Professor of Old Testament at the University of Glasgow

wikipedia_page.main: Robert Davidson (30 March 1927 – 22 September 2012) was Professor of Old Testament at the University of Glasgow (Trinity College) and was Moderator of the General Assembly of the Church of Scotland in 1990.

response: Teachers in the pre-1930 College included Alexander Balmain Bruce, James Denney, George A. Smith, James Moffatt, Henry Drummond, and James Orr. In the modern era, in the reunited faculty, notable teachers have included John MacQuarrie, William H.C. Frend, William Barclay, John Zizioulas, Robert Davidson George Newlands, John Riches, Heather Walton (theologian) Charlotte Methuen (Church Historian) . The former Clerk was Rev. Dr.  A. K. M. Adam. The current Clerk is Rev Dr Mark Johnston.
